resources.string: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

I am Leye. 
I am an Android Developer (Java/Kotlin). I am also an Oracle Certified Java SE 11 Developer. 
I like to say that "I am a lover of chess and something else." But I also love to code; it makes me feel ecstatic. 
That said, this program was made as an individual effort to put my android skills to test. 
There is no affiliation to any television program, persons, or organization. 
Thank you
